resources.string: Everything about the Resurrection Remix OS
Show your support to Resurrection Remix OS
Get more information about Resurrection Remix OS
Be a member of Resurrection forum

● Founder 
● Project leader 
● Head developer 
● UX designer 
● Maintainer
List of devices and their official RR-OS maintainers
Send a PM to \'Varun Date\' on Hangouts containing the link to your ROM thread if you want your name to be added in Device Maintainers list.
Let people know you use Resurrection Remix OS
Reset all settings to default values?
Enable/disable to show/hide floating button in configurations. Enter/exit once when switch used
Customize various elements of the statusbar clock and date
Enable or disable Resurrection logo in statusbar. Customize color and position
Enable or disable icons in statusbar. Customize their elements and position
Customize battery elements in statusbar and also customize the battery bar
Enable or disable icons of your choice in statusbar
Customize the ticker style in statusbar
Enable or disable temperature in statusbar and customize its style
Enable or disable network traffic monitor in statusbar and customize its style, activity threshold and readings
Enable or disable carrier label in statusbar and customize its style
Enable or disable gestures used on statusbar
Give a breathing effect to notifications such as SMS, missed call and voice mail
Customize various elements in notification drawer such as transparency and stroke
Customize various elements in volume dialog such as transparency and stroke
Customize the brightness and transparency of the power menu interface
Customize the various elements in recents panel such as membar, immersive recents etc.
Replace native clear all button with original floating action button and customize its position
Enable or disable animations when tapping qs tiles and customize them
Choose various gestures acquired on lockscreen
Enable, disable and customize various elements provided on lockscreen
Customize the bottom left and right shortcuts to your choice on lockscreen
Customize the weather layout on lockscreen
Enable or disable various security features provided for lockscreen
Draw your gestures to launch preferred activity
Use a side bar to store your apps and activities that can be launched quickly with ease
Use a circular sidebar to store your quick apps and activities
Swipe from the edge to enable/disable a pie that consists of cool shortcuts and navigation controls
Enable or disable softkeys and customize them
Customize various options seen on power menu dialog
Customize the animations of each window in system
Enable or disable animations in power menu and also choose from a list of animations
Customize various toast popup animations and icons
Enable or disable ambient display and customize its components
Choose to enable or disable heads up notifications and also set up their timeouts
Customize various options for clock app
Check for OTA updates and other links
Customize the look of your notifications in notification panel
Disables transition animations such as when launching an app
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Show battery status for the currently connected bluetooth device, if available.
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Customize the ticker style in statusbar
